content: I’ve tried in vain to find textbank sign-ups for these states (from IL, so close to my heart).  I am doing NC, GA, but really want to help text in the midwestern states too.  Any idea how to link up to these states text team’s?

Hi <@1287186947667656715> our teams textbank to many states, they aren't location specific. You can find events in specific location on mobilize.us. I put "text" in the search and "Illinios" in the location. https://www.mobilize.us/?country=US&q=text&state=IL
